DOC.brief_summary: This clinical , randomize , cross-over study obese healthy subject aim analyse acute effect incretin hormon Glucose Dependent Insulinotropic Polypeptide ( GIP ) metabolic parameter gene expression subcutaneous adipose tissue .
DOC.brief_title: Acute Effects Glucose Dependent Insulinotropic Polypeptide ( GIP ) Subcutaneous Adipose Tissue
DOC.criteria: BMI > 28 Healthy subject Normal glucose tolerance Diabetes , IFG , IGT Chronicalinflammatory diseases Hb < 12g/dl Elevation liver enzymes creatinin concentration Great weight change within last 12 month Any cancer diagnosis last 10 year
